data.actual_result: The info modal stays in place and doesn't fold like it would do if I will focus with the mouse button
data.short_description: Being able to stop focusing on profile details (in guild) while still keeping it on the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the member list modal of a guild - Left click on a member (so the info modal will pop - Focus on the chat form by pressing the mouse wheel instead of clicking with the mouse button - observe
